info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN JEFFERSON... SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA...EAST CENTRAL CARROLL AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 AM EDT... At 615 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Wellsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weirton, East Liverpool, Wellsville, Toronto, Calcutta, Chester, New Cumberland, Salineville, Newell, Bergholz, Irondale, and New Manchester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
